testcase.system-out: Given the user is logged in sucussfully and is on home page.................passed When the user mouse over on the company option from the menu bar and clicks on new company from the list.passed And fill the from with appropreate details..................................passed And clicks on the save button...............................................passed Then the user should able to see the new company created "Company Name".....passed
